title: Records regarding proposed funds transfer in Detention and Corrections (Alameda County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Correspondence and documents that reference the proposed transfer of appropriations within the Detention and Corrections Division of ACSO, as described in the Board Letter attached to Agenda item 33.1 of the December 5, 2023 Board of Supervisors meeting. The Board Letter is attached, and also can be accessed at: https://www.acgov.org/board/bos_calendar/documents/DocsAgendaReg_12_05_23/PUBLIC%20PROTECTION/Regular%20Calendar/Sheriff_360603.pdf

If you would like to discuss these requests, please feel free to reach out to me, John Lindsay-Poland, co-director of the American Friends Service Committee California Healing Justice Program at jlindsay-poland@afsc.org or by phone at 510-282-8983.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

John Lindsay-Poland

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: DoD Money to HISD
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All contracts the US Department of Defense or any entity of the US Department of Defense has with the Houston Independent School District that has been created since 2019.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kevin Ozebek
